channel.title: security on Security engineering by vixentael
channel.description: Recent content in security on Security engineering by vixentael

item.title: OWASP Zhytomyr meetup: SSDLC and product security
item.description: OWASP Zhytomyr meetup “Security on your project from scratch”: risks analysis, building SSLDC, working with the development team and checklists.

item.title: AppForce1: news and info for iOS app developers
item.description: Semi-fun semi-serious podcast episode where Jeroen Leenarts asks me questions about life, education, programming, and security.

item.title: NewPodcast2, ep. 27: vixentael and security
item.description: Russian-speaking podcast about software engineering lead by engineers all over the world.

item.title: Making security usable: product engineer perspective
item.description: This is a story of going through typical security challenges: how to build products that reliably deliver security guarantees, avoid typical pitfalls, and are usable in a predictable fashion by real users.
